sentences.english: Use a disinfecting wipe to clean off tray tables before using.
sentences.chinese: 在使用折叠餐桌前，先用消毒湿巾彻底清洁一遍。

sentences.english: Stick on the opener as it used be after take out the wipes, to keep wet.
sentences.chinese: 取出湿巾后请将易拉贴照原样贴上，以保持湿度。

sentences.english: My toddler loves them and does not resist.
sentences.chinese: 我家大宝很喜欢这种湿巾，从来不抗拒。

sentences.english: The used wipes shall be discarded. Never allow reuse .
sentences.chinese: 请将用过的湿巾扔弃，不可冲洗重复使用。

sentences.english: The notion of Charmin or of Cottonelle is a fairly recent concept.
sentences.chinese: 魅力牌和湿巾纸的奇想是一个相当新的概念。

sentences.english: You need wet-wipes to wipe off all impurity in the lab.
sentences.chinese: 你得用湿巾纸擦去实验室的这些杂质。

sentences.english: Time for the Lady Macbeth Handi Wipes.
sentences.chinese: 这是麦克白夫人汉帝女士湿巾试验的时间。

sentences.english: I wanted to get my daughter used to dental care at an early age.
sentences.chinese: 我以为她会讨厌用这款湿巾，没想到她很喜欢。

sentences.english: Will not need to use this wipes as napkins, or can be used to wipe her face.
sentences.chinese: 不消将这块湿巾当作餐巾用，也不可以用来擦脸。

sentences.english: Can be used to stimulate the PP, in his excitement, he will be pulling hard.
sentences.chinese: 可以用湿巾在他PP那刺激刺激，他自己就会使劲拉。

sentences.english: which deals in disposable moist towelettes and toilet seat covers.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司主要生产一次性湿巾和马桶坐垫。

sentences.english: Is more wipes moisture content is good or less is good?
sentences.chinese: 湿巾的含水量是多好还是少好？

sentences.english: Rub it on, then immediately wipe it off with a washcloth or tissue.
sentences.chinese: 抹上之后，立刻用毛巾或湿巾擦试干净。

definition: variant of 棉籤|棉签[mian2 qian1]/cotton swab
sterilized absorbent cotton wool (used for dressings or cleansing wounds)/sanitary napkin/tampon
